title: Deployment
description: See the detailed data of the Deployment. Select the participant for further individual data.

devices_card.title: Devices
devices_card.description: Select the master device in order to deploy.

device_deployment.description: The device will be permanently deployed. You can not undo this action.
device_deployment.title: Deployment of a Master Device
device_deployment.submit: I'm sure I want to deploy it

data_card.title: Data
data_card.description: See an overview of the collected data for each participant master device.

stop_deployment.title: Stop deployment
stop_deployment.description: The deployment will be permanently stopped and will no longer be running.
stop_deployment.alert: You can not undo this action.
stop_deployment.confirm: I'm sure I want to stop it

page_description: See the detailed data of the Deployment. Select the participant for further individual data.
